subject: Immigration and Emigration
Playoff Games
Illegal Immigrants
Law and Legislation
lead_paragraph: Phoenix, wearing its “Los Suns” jerseys in part to protest Arizona’s new immigration law, held off the Spurs to take a 2-0 series lead in the Western Conference semifinals.
snippet: Phoenix, wearing its “Los Suns” jerseys in part to protest Arizona’s new immigration law, held off the Spurs to take a 2-0 series lead in the Western Conference semifinals.
